pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist. Let's get you back on track.
tagline: Your ideal partner for comfortable stays and successful events in Oromia.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Please fill out the form below to request a booking for your selected dormitory room.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: Your phone number for Telegram payment proof identification.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Optional: Your phone number for easier communication.
enterEmployer: Enter name of your employer or organization
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is already booked or unavailable for the selected dates.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates or part of them.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently marked as unavailable by the administration.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Capacity for the selected dormitory is not properly configured. Please contact admin.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Failed to fetch dormitory details. Please try again later.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
fillFormToBookFacility: Please fill out the form below to request a booking for the selected facility.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional notes?
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. We will contact you soon.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request is received. Please proceed with payment via bank transfer and submit proof on Telegram.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
individualUserNote: Individual users cannot register directly. Please contact administration for dormitory bookings.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
invalidEmailFormat: Invalid email format. Please check and try again.
userDataMissingError: User data could not be loaded. Please contact support.
networkRequestFailedError: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval. We will notify you once it's reviewed.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired dates to check dormitory availability.
errorCheckingAvailability: Could not check availability. Please try again.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories are available for the selected date range.
noDormitoriesAvailable: No dormitories are currently listed or available.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be earlier than start date.
dateRangeRequired: Date range is required for booking.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Item data might be missing.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed successfully.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is pending. Please send your payment proof via Telegram for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team. We will contact you shortly with confirmation or further details.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Booking confirmation details are incomplete. Please contact support if this issue persists.
keyholderDashboardDescription: Manage key assignments and view reports.
assignKeysPageDescription: View paid dormitory bookings and manage key assignments.
noPaidDormBookings: No paid dormitory bookings requiring key assignment found.
dailyReportsPageDescription: View daily reports related to key assignments and returns. (Feature under development)
reportNotAvailableYet: This report is not yet available.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries regarding dormitory rooms within these buildings:
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, facility bookings, or support:
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: Error calculating total cost. Please check item prices and quantities.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your smartphone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Get all the details on the go!
brochureSubtitle: Your premier destination for training, accommodation, and events at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a leading center dedicated to providing high-quality educational training, research, and versatile rental services. We offer state-of-the-art facilities for conferences, meetings, and comfortable dormitory accommodations, all supported by professional catering options. Our mission is to foster learning and collaboration by providing an exceptional environment for all our guests and clients.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure, clean, and affordable rooms for individuals and groups. Ideal for short-term and long-term stays.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern conference halls and meeting sections equipped with the latest technology for your events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options to complement your events and meetings.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to ensure a productive and comfortable experience!
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff providing excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Book Your Stay or Event Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: Contact us to learn more about our services or to make a reservation. We look forward to welcoming you to {siteName}!
enterAccountNumber: Enter your bank account number used for transfer
paymentReferenceNote: Important: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment proof to our Telegram bot @OROTRAIN using your phone number ({phoneNumber}) for identification. Your booking will be confirmed after verification.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Important: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment proof to our Telegram bot @OROTRAIN using your phone number ({phoneNumber}) with Booking ID: {bookingId} for identification. Your booking will be confirmed after verification.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the bank transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment proof to our Telegram bot {botUsername} from the phone number: {phoneNumber}. Your booking will be confirmed once the payment is verified by our admin team.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our admin will verify your payment. You will be notified once confirmed.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not currently expected for this booking, or it has already been processed.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the instructions provided on your booking confirmation or payment details page, which typically involves sending proof via Telegram.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory bookings using your phone number.
enterPhoneNumberPrompt: Enter phone number used for booking
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number, or your booking is still pending.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for bookings. Please try again.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Room {roomNumber} is currently marked as unavailable by the administration and cannot be booked.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book this facility.
noSectionsSelectedOrFound: No sections were selected for booking, or the selected items could not be found.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Fill out the form below to book the selected sections.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Error fetching halls and sections list.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range above to see dormitories available for booking during that period.
checkingAvailabilityForRange: Checking availability for the selected range...
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory room more than once for the same start date with the same phone number.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (index) is required for this operation. Please contact support or an administrator.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: The duplicate booking check was skipped due to a missing database index. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure you haven't already booked for this date.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item {itemName} was not found in the database. It might have been removed.
